snippet.title: Brume - Announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Brume is a cinematic adventure game. Explore a foggy island, defeat knights, slugs and ghosts, and make your way to the old castle.

Releasing on Steam and Itch.io, October 2019.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1119800/Brume/
